ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed port scheduling balancing safety, throughput, and fair berthing.

bullets.item: Safety guardrails with dynamic separation minima.
Throughput gains via slot optimization with weather-aware buffers.
Fairness constraints reflecting labor and community windows.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Enforce AIS-based dynamic separation and fail-safe tug overrides.
Weather-adjusted slotting and berth reallocation with KPIs.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Protect labor windows and emissions caps via fairness guards.
